name: Polgar: Magic detective
description:
Polgar: Magic Detective is an adventure of magic and supernatural crimes. With the help of the spirit Elpis, you will have to investigate each case full of hidden and mysterious evidences. Light torches to illuminate an abandoned tomb, listen to the stranges sounds of a dark forest, or dive into the depths of a lost sea.

Dominus has been using magic creatures to take the law for its own. Find all the clues related to the case and use your logic to discover which creature is the right one. Only then, you will be able to capture the creature and prevent Dominus from using it for evil again.

Key Features:

  • Investigate beautiful hand-drawn crime scenes.
  • Use the bestiary to choose the right creature and solve the crime.
  • Magic, investigation, mystery... Discover the full story of Polgar and Elpis vs. Dominus!
